subsection_content:
Prediabetes is a condition in which blood sugar is higher than normal (in normal people, blood sugar levels before meals range from 90-130 mg/dl and after meals are below 180 mg/dl) but not high enough for a doctor to diagnose. Diagnosis of type 2 diabetes. Currently, Vietnam has about 5.3 million people with pre-diabetes and it is expected that 2/3 of them (accounting for 70%) will turn into diabetes by 2045. (1)
Prediabetes does not have a major impact on health; However, without lifestyle changes, adults and children with prediabetes are at high risk of developing type 2 diabetes. At that time, the disease severely affects the heart, blood vessels, eyes, and kidneys. Detecting pre-diabetes is also an opportunity to help you adjust your lifestyle and improve your health in time to prevent the disease from progressing to diabetes.

tien tieu duong.json. What is prediabetes?
Prediabetes is a condition in which blood sugar is higher than normal (in normal people, blood sugar levels before meals range from 90-130 mg/dl and after meals are below 180 mg/dl) but not high enough for a doctor to diagnose. Diagnosis of type 2 diabetes. Currently, Vietnam has about 5.3 million people with pre-diabetes and it is expected that 2/3 of them (accounting for 70%) will turn into diabetes by 2045. (1)
Prediabetes does not have a major impact on health; However, without lifestyle changes, adults and children with prediabetes are at high risk of developing type 2 diabetes. At that time, the disease severely affects the heart, blood vessels, eyes, and kidneys. Detecting pre-diabetes is also an opportunity to help you adjust your lifestyle and improve your health in time to prevent the disease from progressing to diabetes.
